players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Charlie. He is the mafia. We must vote him out."
You: "Thank you Diana for sharing your investigation. I trust the detective's findings and will vote for Charlie."
Charlie: "I will deny the accusation and remain silent. I'm planning to eliminate Diana next night."
You: "I trust Diana's investigation. Charlie is the mafia and must be voted out."
Diana: "Charlie, your threat to kill me confirms your guilt. Alice, let's vote him out now."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
